page.title: 03A LOVELY DAY IN PRESTATYN
page.content: {A lovely }day in {Prestatyn}should begin when you wake up to see the sun shining.Get dressed, make a picnic and go off to the{beach}with a blanket. When you get to the beach, take your shoes and socks off and go for a paddle in the sea or even a swim. Then come out and sunbathe in the dunes. Afterwards you can go around the{shops}along the{promenade and if you have a dog let it have a walk down with you.There are {souvenir {shops and cafes, and refreshments}for the youngsters and sweets,lollies and ice-creams. When the sun sets and you head for home you can get some{ {fish 'n' chips}or other 'take-away' meal for your supper. You could also spend your evening at one of the{pubs {or clubs}in the resort. { }
